name: move-over-jessica-simpson-jamie-lynn-spears-is-coming-to-town
title: Move Over Jessica Simpson; Jamie Lynn Spears Is Coming To Town
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
We thought we’d heard it all after Bon Jovi, Kid Rock, Jessica Simpson, and even Snoop Dogg started cranking out the country tunes in Nashville. But the latest news from E! Online is that Jamie Lynn Spears, Britney Spears’ mini-me, has been in town recording some demos for her new country album. Jamie Lynn Spears is known for her leading role on Nickelodeon’s Zoey 101, and received a lot of attention last year upon becoming a teenage mother, yet has never pursued music as a career (so we can’t really speculate on this quite yet). We’re now taking bets on who the next random celebrity to show up to record some country hits in Nashville will be. 

Photo from E! Online.
